attributes.action: Admit the current smoking rules are a serious loss of freedom of choice for millions of voting smokers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All we've heard since this new labour/new law came into force is that it's not about freedom of choice but about health-well okay then,i choose to go and sit in a pub in my area for a drink and a smoke with like minded people who are adult enough to pay taxes,drive,vote and realise that maybe they do some things that are bad for them-Do i have a choice? No.
Seperate us from non smokers as we don't want to inflict harm on anyone who chooses not to smoke-or listen to non smokers whining.But admit smokers are millions strong and always will be and that we pump major cash into the countrys coffers which will be snatched from elsewhere should we all give up.
